fields.title: Mzansi Power Bowl
fields.description: Quinoa, grilled chicken, chakalaka drizzle, and roasted butternut.

fields.title: Grill Master’s Beef Burger
fields.description: 200g patty, melted cheddar, caramelized onions, and tangy chutney.

fields.title: Cheeky Chicken Strips
fields.description: Crispy chicken tenders with a side of fries.

fields.title: Milktart Slice
fields.description: Buttery crust with a creamy cinnamon-spiced filling.

fields.title: Amarula Dream Cheesecake
fields.description: Creamy cheesecake infused with Amarula liqueur.

fields.title: Bangkok Street Pad Thai
fields.description: Wok-fried rice noodles with prawns, egg, bean sprouts, and peanuts in a tangy tamarind sauce.

fields.title: Rio BBQ Picanha
fields.description: Brazilian-style grilled rump with chimichurri and roasted garlic potatoes.

fields.title: Beer Buddy Platter
fields.description: Jalapeño poppers, crumbed mushrooms, mini sausages, and cheesy fries.

fields.title: Cheese & Charcuterie Street Style
fields.description: Local cheeses, cured meats, fruit preserves, and artisanal crackers.

fields.title: The Mega Mzansi
fields.description: A giant tray of peri-peri chicken, boerewors, wings, ribs, chips, and slaw, serves 4–5.
